title: Catamaran

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Pull a player into the depths, attacking them Powerful-ly and cleaning them. (0 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You'll gain a use of your ability whenever a member of the Warfleet dies.
- You may multitask your ability with the factional kill.
- You may not perform the factional kill until upgraded.

fields.name: Upgrade:
fields.value:
- You may now perform the factional kill.
- Your vengeance fuels you Depending on the amount of dead Warfleet members, you gain certain buffs.
> 1: One-time basic defense.
> 2: Attack upgraded to Unstoppable.
> 3+: Your attacks now Rampage.
- When you die, you may choose a player to drag down with you, dealing an Unstoppable attack to them next night. If the game would enter an end-game state because of this, the Warfleet reign victorious.
- You will retain your upgrade effects if promoted to the Warlord.

desc:
Post 2690
*Sacrifices will be made, but we stand strong. Strike them down, men.*
